name: BIM 360 Model Coordination API Sample - Clash View Basic Application
description: This repository demonstrates basic viewing of clash raw data by Model Coordination API. It lists all clash instances data, and allows the user to click one instance to highlight within Forge Viewer.

FORGE_CLIENT_ID.description: Forge Client ID. Ensure this ID also provisions with BIM 360 account

FORGE_CALLBACK_URL.description: Callback URL of your Forge app, required for 3-legged OAuth
